\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	\bullet &&& \bullet \\
	& \bullet & \bullet \\
	& \bullet & \bullet \\
	\bullet &&& \bullet
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[squiggly, hook', from=1-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=2-3]
	\arrow[squiggly, two heads, from=1-4, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[squiggly, hook', from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[squiggly, two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{s_1}"{description}, from=3-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{s_2}"{description}, curve={height=-30pt}, dashed, from=4-1, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=4-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=4-1, to=4-4]
	\arrow[from=4-4, to=3-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
